snippet: Before retiring Tim Duncan's No. 21, the San Antonio Spurs paid tribute to their longtime teammate by playing the game as he did for 19 seasons....
lead_paragraph: Before retiring Tim Duncan's No. 21, the San Antonio Spurs paid tribute to their longtime teammate by playing the game as he did for 19 seasons.

headline.main: Spurs Celebrate Duncan, Beat Pelicans in Fundamental Fashion
headline.print_headline: Spurs Celebrate Duncan, Beat Pelicans in Fundamental Fashion
